title.narrative: Rural Development: District Livelihoods Support Programme

description.narrative: Key Project Objectives: The goal of the Programme is to achieve significant improvement in the standard and sustainability of livelihoods of poor rural households. Supporting objectives are: rural communities are empowered and self-reliant; household productivity and incomes are sustainably increased; individual and communal land is better managed and rationally utilised; critical infrastructure and services are accessible; and Districts are supported to provide services locally.Policy and Institutional Objectives: The Programme supports the deepening of the decentralisation process and its implementation in newer districts. In order to address some of the specific constraints that poor people face with regard to land tenure, land management and women''s rights, the proposed Programme includes specific measures to support new land, land use and domestic relations policies at the District level.

name.narrative: Rural Development: District Livelihoods Support Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
